document.heading: Fiscal Year 2014 Budget Support Technical Clarification Amendment Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-117, the “Fiscal Year 2014 Budget Support Technical Clarification Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-482. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 3, 2013, and February 4, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on March 7, 2014 it was assigned Act No. 20-291 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-117 became effective on June 26, 2014.
